place_description:
Sustainability is the driver and focus of our coffee concept. Quality, ethical sourcing, and flavor are the criteria we search for when identifying local roasters to source our coffee beans. Featuring carefully curated coffee, tea, and juices, our expansive menu is reflective of the never-ending search for rich flavors and uncompromising quality. Our goal is to foster a community network of local business where people can develop an appreciation for local products. Choosing local roasters supports our community and guarantees the quality and freshness of our menu items.

There’s something special about the ritual of grabbing a fresh cup of coffee to get your day started or catching up with friends in our beloved Community.

reviews_data.review_text:
I love to have other coffee options other than the large chain shops.
It's kind of hard to see from the main road. It's located/situated in an awkward corner of the road.
I don't care for the parking lot. I can see turning in being a nightmare because of the corner lot being so close to the main road. There are maybe about 8-10 tight parking spots. I can imagine if they are all full people will keep driving

I walked in and was greeted nicely. I ordered the hot Chai with caramel,  it was really good.
It's small and cozy inside. Great spot to come and work remotely or pick up a drink and a quick snack. Outside seating was a plus.
I do recommend trying it.
No one answers the phone to set up group events. Disappointing on that aspect. They just opened so that may be why. I'll add to the review after our event scheduled for April 3rd.
Great service and really good coffee and the owner is so sweet and personable.
Lovely new coffee shop with pleasant baristas

My wife and I went here early on a Saturday morning as we like to try as many coffee places as we can. We order a cappuccino and americano for drinks and a chocolate croissant, almond croissant, and English cranberry scone for pastries. The croissants were dry and chewy (tasted a day old but not sure if they were). We got there at 730 so I would assume they get their pastries delivered first thing in the morning but didnt they didn't taste fresh. The coffee was decent. It is a quaint little spot for a morning coffee.

Cozy Vibes and a Perfect Work Spot

This coffee shop is exactly what the area needs. I stopped in to cowork with a friend and was extremely pleased with the overall vibe. The decor is warm and inviting--just the kind of space that makes you want to settle in. And yes, I have a thing for bathrooms, and they did their big one with the design in there.

While working, I had a traditional latte with almond milk and a toasted chocolate croissant both were delicious and gave me the fuel I needed to focus. The cafe had a steady stream of customers, from casual walk-ins to folks getting work done. There's outdoor seating and a parking lot, which makes it even more convenient. Definitely adding Hilltop Coffee to my regular rotation.
Excited to finally have a local coffee shop near my house! Cute decor, very chic and modern. Typical coffee options and some pastries as well.

This place is so beautiful! I love how clean and modern it looks on the inside. The staff was very friendly and the coffee was amazing and for a good price! This will be one of my new favorites in Charlotte!
Great cappuccino & very friendly staff

Came in to try it out and we will definitely be return customers. The baristas were so kind and answered all of my questions.

We ordered a chai latte with espresso as well as a customized matcha latte. Both were amazing! The croissants were impeccable.

I love how clean and airy the shop is. 10/10!!!
Good coffee place in a neighborhood with quiet ambience. We tried Lavender latte and it's a 4/5 which is quite good. Try it!!!

Fiance had a vanilla iced latte and almond croissant, after a sip and a bite she said she wants to go here every day.
There is outdoor seating so bring a book and relax outside.
I strongly recommend this coffee shop not only for the quality but for the passion they put into making everything fantastic.

First off- this is so close to me. I'm so happy we have a choice other than genocide supporter Starbucks and Dunkin Donuts. Second, the coffee is perfection! I got 3 vanilla lattes so far this week and it is consistent and super delicious. The inside is super clean, the ladies at the front were friendly enough. All in all- I hope Hilltop Coffee stays here a looong time.
Vanilla latte was good and a good price! Will be back soon .

Prices are around your average coffee shops in my opinionn and worth paying for instead going to the usual bucks. The base menu is pretty simple and you can alter it based on your preferences (syrups, milk options, etc.) I got an iced vanilla latte with oat milk with a butter croissant. The latte was so good, the proprtion to the coffee vs milk was perfect for my taste buds as i find some places put too much milk esp when you get it iced. Service was very friendly and they were quite busy which was nice to see for a newly opened business. Parking is limited but there are some areas to park in the area and you can walk to the coffee shop (however, park at your own discretion if you do this). I'm really glad a good coffee shop opened up near where I live, finally something other than bucks. Will be coming back!
Found this hip spot while on a trip. Great atmosphere, good music, tasty cold brew!

I just had the most amazing almond milk vanilla latte - it truly hugged my soul. Just what I needed to start my day. Staff was so kind and friendly. 1000000% recommend this spot for coffee, atmosphere and the croissants looked amazing, although Im trying to stay away from bread :)

This new coffee shop is an absolute gem! The staff is warm and welcoming, and the decor is flawless, clean, and thoughtfully designed. I ordered a caramel iced latte with oat milk, and it was hands down the best I've ever had--perfectly balanced and absolutely delicious. I also picked up a couple of scones, which were just as amazing. I can't wait to come back and make this a regular spot! Highly recommend!
The English Jalapeno scone, pistachio latte and superb service with a boutique vibe! Just what I need to get me to the end of this week.  See you tomorrow!

Their selection is small and prices are high. The customer service could be better, especially for being a brand new. The young ladies at the counter seemed to be annoyed when I asked them questions about their menu. They looked at each other and would laugh/grin, it didn't feel like a good first experience.
Very nice coffee shop, Chai Latte was good.

I went the first week it opened and it was by far the best latte I've had in Charlotte! The staff were extremely nice. There was a bit of a wait on drinks because it was so busy--the staff (I think maybe an owner?) checked on all of us and offered free pastries for the wait, so I'd say the service is really good, too. I'll definitely be back and am SO happy we have a new local coffee shop in the University area!
Great prices on the coffee and the jalapeno scone is amazing
Good coffee and pastries with a nice, pleasant atmosphere. I think the inside could fit 2-3 more tables but overall a welcomed addition of a coffee shop besides Starbucks to the north Charlotte area!
Beautiful and cozy setting, friendly service. Amazing coffee!
Baristas were kind and answered my questions without issues! The coffe was great also I got a vanilla and honey latte
Latte was amazing!

I was impressed from the moment I opened the door. From the warm welcome from passionate staff to the beautiful yet thoughtful decor and layout.   The coffee was so good and the warm jalapeno cheese scone was the perfect mate. I even got to meet the owners, who should be very proud of Hilltop. It's my new favorite coffee shop !

We have been waiting for the spot to open. What a great surprise! A light bright cozy coffee place with superb customer service. Joy and her team will make you feel at home and even welcome your puppy :-) delicious coffee and pastries.
Very cute new coffee shop, loved my matcha drink and the pastries were massive and delicious!

Excellent service and drinks.   I got an iced mocha, and my husband got a caramel latte.   We were both extremely satisfied.    The pastries looked fluffy and fresh.   I was eyeing the chocolate croissant but was still full from breakfast!

First time checking out hilltop coffee today and I will definitely be back. The employees are so sweet and the atmosphere is great. Not to mention the coffee and pastries are delicious as well definitely go check them out.

I live right by Hilltop. I could not wait for them to open and be able to walk over for coffee! They did not disappoint. The coffee and pastries are delicious. The atmosphere and staff are great! Thank you for opening up in the area!

What a great little coffee shop! Pastries look delicious and the coffee was so good! The first sip we all said Wow this coffee is really good! The atmosphere is clean and bright   We will definitely be back!
This place is so pretty and the coffee is great! I got a latte with oat milk and it was awesome! The people here are also really nice! Love seeing new places like this already doing so well!

Really quaint atmosphere. I had the moca which was rich and frothy. The service was excellent and the owner was kind and worked upfront with her employees which I really liked and it seemed like a really great work environment. The only drawback I had is the lack of seating but it is kinda a granted because of the small building but full 5 stars would highly recommend!
Really comfortable seating and the jalapeno & cheddar scones were soo good!
What a great new space! The lavender latte was out of this world. The baristas are cheery and gracious. I cannot wait to try their other creations.
I just got a latte and MAN o MAN. It's amazing! So excited for a great coffee shop in the area!

Service, food and atmosphere were excellent! Joy, Rashad and the team were so great and made the experience even better! Oh, and the music... spot on! I encourage everyone to go, I will DEFINITELY be back!

So great to have a local coffee shop in the University City/Mallard Creek area...and oh what a lovely space!  The atmosphere is inviting and comfortable.  We tried a dirty chai latte, a toasted marshmallow latte, and the cheddar jalapeno scone...all were delicious!  The owners, Joy and Rashad, are so friendly, kind, and gracious.  Mariah, the cashier was also awesome!  The other staff, Mariah, and the owners checked on us during our visit.  I can't wait to go back!  I'm craving a scone!
